name: LPL Financial Denver
overview: Richard C. McDowell Jr. has been providing investment guidance and financial services to individuals and businesses in Denver, CO for over 25 years. As a Chartered Financial Consultant(ChFC), he is knowledgeable in investments, retirement planning, insurance, tax planning and estate planning. His area of emphasis is wealth accumulation and retirement planning. As a full service financial consultant with an independent broker/dealer, he offers clients access to an assortment of quality non-proprietary investment choices. These include(but are not limited to) mutual funds, stocks, bonds, REIT’s, ETF’s, variable and fixed annuities. They can be purchased either on a commission basis or through fee based programs, depending upon the circumstances.
